record.title: RECESS

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that under the previous order the Senate stand in recess until the appointed hour.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered. The Senate will stand in recess until the appointed hour.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:22 p.m., recessed until 3:30 p.m. and reassembled when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mrs. Murray).
record.chair: The Senator from California is recognized.
